abstract: Under the deal, Yahoo will feature its search engine on mobile portals run by Telefónica of Spain in 15 countries in Europe and Latin America.
snippet: Under the deal, Yahoo will feature its search engine on mobile portals run by Telefónica of Spain in 15 countries in Europe and Latin America.
lead_paragraph: LONDON, Oct. 1 — Yahoo, trying to catch up with Google in the digital search and advertising businesses, said today that it had reached an agreement to feature its search engine on mobile portals run by Telefónica, the Spanish telecommunications company.

headline.main: Yahoo in 15-Nation Deal for Search on Cellphones
